title: Sunrise360
author: Sunrise360
content: What is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?it's straightforward about potential profit.At the bottom of the bear market, buy as much as possible. Then hold. Hold and wait for the bull. When the bull market is at its peak, then sell. With this strategy, you will surely make some profit, but there is no guarantee of how long it will last.and of course, you must not panic, you must be patient.

comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?Bull market means most of the coins is pumping and moving in upward direction no matter what coins in the market. You can always utilize profit on this market by opening long position or buying in every low everyday because the price will surely recover on the next daily candle if it’s bull market. Bear market is the obvious opposite, this is the time when shorting the market is preferred or DCA(Dollar Cost Average) to slowly stock tokens that you want to save in preparation for the next bull run.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear markethttps://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bullmarket.asphttps://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bearmarket.aspQuote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMhow can one utilize them to make some good profits?Very simple for these two market conditions. During a bull run, we should take that moment to take profits and don't be greedy as much as you can because you might miss the train.And the same goes for the bear market, it's the moment to start buying because we might also miss buying at the cheapest price or if not the cheapest, at least a very low and affordable price compared during the bull run.

comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?Based on experience, here is what I know if, a. Buy and Hold and wait for the net bull run to sell and make profits.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?They are all descriptions of what is happening in the market. Both terms are derived from the stock market, as during a certain period of time, let's say a cycle, the price passes through both cases, and both cases are characterized by the opposite of the other.During Bull market, the price continues to rise, the greed increases. Everyone wants to buy or sell, but greed is what forces them to continue.In a bear merket, the price continues to decline, fear increases. Everyone wants to sell, but fear is what forces them to sell at a very low price.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?Let's simplify it. A bull market is a condition where you can sell your coins at the highest price. For some coins, the price can reach the highest price ever reached.In contrast to a bull market, a bear market is a condition where you can buy a lot of coins that have the opportunity to go high when the bull market arrives. These coins usually have a good history, but not all can get a chance to go high during a bull market.So you can use the bull market to make big profits and the bear market to buy lots of good coins. And you can only find them through research.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?The bull and the bear markets are the most basic and frequently used terms in cryprocurrency because of the volatility (upward and downward) movement of cryptos.The Bull market, simply means the prices of crypto is moving high, and at this period long term holders are always at profit but most times, since profits are made at this point, the rate of greed also increases and people want to hold more for more profit. The Bear market on the other hand, is the direct opposite of the bull market because at this point, there is always a continuous decrease or fall in the prices of crypto and at this point long term holders are likely to make losses.The bear market exposes the strong and smart investors because despite the fall and depreciation of the value of their portfolio, they still hold and keep waiting on the bear market's return, while others might sell along the line because of fear I always advise the use of stop loss because it helps greatly when the bear market comes saving you the emotional stress of watching your portfolio depreciate and you can just buy again at the peak of the bear run which helps to maximize profits.

comments.body: Quote from: Sunrise360 on September 19, 2022, 12:38:06 PMWhat is the real difference between bull and bear market and how can one utilize them to make some good profits?The difference is in the name and if you understand it from the name and you study the market to relate it and see what is happening there you will see that bear and bull are not the same.Bull and bear are just word used for crypto trading. Bull means when price is appreciating and going higher while bear is decrease in price. So how profit is made is in the investment time. You buy a coin during bear which is the time it has dropped, then you can buy more at lower price and you can sell the coins you bought at bull time which is at higher price, then you will make profit.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: A safe strategy to make profit with cryptocurrency is to always think on long term, preparing yourself during one season to make profit only on the next one. That is, to acquire most coins as possible during the bear market (since currencies are cheaper), so you hold them and sell for profit once the bull market begins. You just have to be patient and the more money you have to invest the better, because it can take up to few years until you can conclude this strategy for financial gains, so the profit must make it worth the time you had to wait.
